column5: Just noticed a topic requesting a lawyer and it made me think of Kirk. I haven't seen him around for some time and was missing his posts. I checked his profile and the last time he was seen was April/09.  Getting kind of quiet around OFC without the long time members showing up all that much anymore.
Hope he didn't end up as one of the thousand.. chained at the bottom of the ocean....  Miss joking with the bugger... he'll turn back up at some point.
